section.summary:
Patient Presentation and Outcome Measures

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will explore the components of a patient presentation. In addition, we will discuss outcome measures used in research vs. outcome measures used in clinical practice. We will discuss the MYMOP as a clinical outcome tool for acupuncturists. For our stats chat, we will discuss the concept of statistical power.

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #4: "Outcomes Worksheet". Please download the worksheet and the two additional documents before class (see below).

Due this week:

  • Due June 27th before class- Initial post in Discussion Forum #2

Due next class:

  • MYMOP initial form
  • Paulus et al. 2002, Andersen et al. 2011, Cherkin et al. 2009, Langevin et al. 2006
  • Due July 11th before class - Respond to 2 posts in Discussion Forum #2
